import React from 'react' import { addentity } from '../actions' import { useState } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import TopMenu from '../components/TopMenu' function AddCategory(props) { const [entity, setEntity] = useState(null) const [synonyms, setSynonyms] = useState(null) const [content, setContent] = useState(null) const handelSubmit = (entity, content, synonyms) => { const newEntity = { idUser: props.fb, entity: { synonyms, content, name: entity } } props.addEntity(newEntity) // .then(() => massagingData()) } return (

Add Category

setEntity(e.target.value)} />

Products Synonyms
{content}
setSynonyms(e.target.value)} placeholder="Add Synonym" required />
) } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { addEntity: (data) => dispatch(addentity(data)), } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { fb: state.fbdata.tokenDetail.userID, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(AddCategory)
